name: undo-sound
description: Plays a sound effect on undo, redo, and save

undo-sound.enabled.description: Enable or disable all sound effects.

undo-sound.soundFilePath.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for undo. Leave empty to use the bundled sound.

undo-sound.redoSoundFilePath.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for redo. Leave empty to use the bundled sound.

undo-sound.saveSoundFilePath.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for save. Leave empty to use the bundled sound.

undo-sound.toggleOnSoundFilePath.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file that plays when sounds are toggled on. Leave empty to use the bundled sound.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
